String.string: "I didn't ask to be a hero."

Look back on your path as a hero.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
Unleash your Temper! Let them behold your Wrath!

Speak with your memory and conquer your Temper.
(Use the Unknown Device at {@Rgn:4013$$Edge of the Mountain} if you leave the quest area.)
